name: hypercerts
description: Scalable retrospective reward systems for impact
author: Hypercerts Foundation

scripts.copy: pnpm copy:frontend && pnpm copy:docs && pnpm copy:html
scripts.copy:html: find build/ -name '*.html' -type f | grep -v index.html | sed s/\.html$// | xargs -I _ bash -c 'mkdir -p _ && cp -v _.html _/index.html'
scripts.deploy:site: turbo run build --filter=@hypercerts-org/docs --filter=hypercerts-protocol && turbo run deploy --filter=@hypercerts-org/frontend && pnpm copy
scripts.e2e:serve-for-dev: (pnpm e2e:infra-down || true) && docker compose -f docker/compose.yaml --env-file ./.env.local --env-file ./docker/base.env --env-file ./docker/dev.env up
scripts.e2e:serve-for-test: (pnpm e2e:infra-down || true) && ENVIRONMENT=tests docker compose -f docker/compose.yaml --env-file ./docker/base.env --env-file ./docker/dev.env --env-file ./.env.local --profile testing up
scripts.e2e:run-tests: (pnpm e2e:infra-down || true) && docker compose -f docker/compose.yaml --env-file ./docker/base.env --env-file ./docker/e2e.env --profile testing run --service-ports playwright
scripts.e2e:ci-run-tests: CI=1 docker-compose -f docker/compose.yaml --env-file ./docker/base.env --env-file ./docker/e2e.env --profile testing run --service-ports playwright
scripts.e2e:ci-logs: CI=1 docker compose -f docker/compose.yaml --env-file ./docker/base.env --env-file ./docker/e2e.env --profile testing logs
